- 谁说的? - 我没看清楚,
- Who did? - I didn't see them,

- 但有一个是胖子. - 哦, 艾莉亚.
- but I think one was fat. - Oh, Arya. ( Sighs )

我没说谎! 他们说你找到了私生子
I'm not lying! They said you found the bastard
cleaned_subtitle: I'm telling the truth! They claimed you discovered the secret child.

subtitle:
还有狼和狮将打成一团--
and the wolves are fighting the lions and the savage--

好象还有什么野蛮人.
something about the savage.

- 你在哪儿听到的? - 在地下城,
- Where did you hear this? - In the dungeons,

在龙的头骨附近.
near the dragon skulls.

你去地下城干什么?
What were you doing in the dungeons?

抓一只猫.
Chasing a cat.
( Knocks, door opens )

抱歉, 大人.
Pardon, My Lord.
有个守夜人想要见你. There's a night's watchman here begging a word.
他说有要紧事. He says it's urgent.

- 你叫什么, 朋友? - 尤伦, 打扰您了.
- Your name, friend? - Yoren, if it please.

这一定是您的公子. 长得跟您真像.
This must be your son. He has the look.

我是女孩!
I'm a girl!

是班扬派你来的么?
Did Benjen send you?

不是的, 大人.
No one sent me, My Lord.

我是来寻找守长城的人手,
I'm here to find men for the Wall,

看看这边地牢里有没等待发落的人渣
see if there's any scum in the dungeons

或许能在长城派上用场.
that might be fit for service.

哦, 我们会帮你征召新兵.
Oh, we'll find recruits for you.

谢谢您, 大人.
Thank you, My Lord.

但我来找您不是为了这个.
But that's not why I disturb you now.

您的兄弟班扬是黑衣军的一员--
Your brother Benjen, his blood runs black--

我和您一样是他的兄弟.
makes him as much my brother as yours.

我正是为了他才飞速赶来
It's for his sake I rode here so hard
差点把我的马都给累死了. I damn near killed my horse.
cleaned_subtitle: Almost made my horse tire out. I came really close to exhausting my horse.

subtitle:
还有其他人也在飞速赶路.
There are others riding too.

明天全城都会知道了.
The whole city will know by tomorrow.

知道什么?
Know what?

这事最好私下谈, 大人.
Best said in private, My Lord.

走吧. 我们等会再谈.
Go on. We'll talk more later.

乔里, 带她回房间.
Jory, take her safely to her room.

走吧, 小姐. 您听见您父亲的吩咐了.
Come along, My Lady. You heard your father.

我父亲有多少守卫?
How many guards does my father have?

在君临这儿吗? 有五十个.
Here in King's Landing? 50.

你不会让任何人有机会杀他, 对不对?
You wouldn't let anyone kill him, would you?

您不必担心这个, 小姐.
No fear on that count, little lady.

- 怎么? - 是关于您夫人的, 大人.
- Well? - It's about your wife, My Lord.

她抓了小恶魔.
She's taken the Imp.
( Neighs )

欢迎您远道而来, 史塔克夫人.
You're far from home, Lady Stark.

请问您是谁?
To whom do I speak?

瓦狄斯伊根, 艾林谷的骑士.
Ser Vardis Egan, knight of the Vale.

艾林夫人知道您来访吗?
Is Lady Arryn expecting your visit?

我们事先来不及通知.
There was no time to send word.

冒昧问一句, 夫人,
May I ask, My Lady,
他怎么会和您在一起? why he is with you?

正是为了他的事.
That's why there was no time.

- 他是我的俘虏. - 他看起来不象个俘虏.
- He is my prisoner. - He doesn't look like a prisoner.
我妹妹会决定怎么对待他. My sister will decide what he looks like.

是, 夫人.
Yes, My Lady.

她在家里.
She will at that.

鹰巢城. 据说它是无法攻破的.
The Eyrie. They say it's impregnable.

给我十个勇士和几柄长枪--
Give me 10 good men and some climbing spikes--

我保证搞定那个婊子.
I'll impregnate the bitch.
cleaned_subtitle:
I assure you, I will help her.
I'll assist the woman.

subtitle:
我喜欢你.
Tyrion: I like you.

史塔克大人, 请您前往
Lord Stark, your presence has been requested

御前会议厅出席紧急会议.
in the small council chamber. A meeting has been called.

我需要先单独面见国王.
I need to see the King first-- alone.

国王已经在会议厅了, 大人.
The King is at the small council meeting, My Lord.

他正召你前去.
He has summoned you.

- 是关于我妻子的事吗? - 不是, 大人.
- Is it about my wife? - No, My Lord.

我想是有关丹妮莉丝坦格利安的事.
I believe it concerns Daenerys Targaryen.

那贱货怀孕了.
The whore is pregnant.
cleaned_subtitle: The person has fallen pregnant.

subtitle:
- 你在谈论谋杀一个婴儿. - 我警告过你
- You're speaking of murdering a child. - I warned you

会发生这种事. 还在北境时我就警告过你,
this would happen. Back in the North, I warned you,

但你却充耳不闻.
but you didn't care to hear.

好吧, 现在你听清楚.
Well, hear it now.

我要他们死, 母子两个一起死.
I want 'em dead, mother and child both.
外加那个笨蛋韦赛里斯. And that fool Viserys as well.

这样说够明白了吧?
Is that plain enough for you?
我要他们一起死. I want them both dead.

你这样做会永远失去荣誉.
You will dishonor yourself forever if you do this.

荣誉?!
Honor?!

我需要统治七大王国!
I've got Seven Kingdoms to rule!

一个国王, 七个王国.
One King, Seven Kingdoms.

你以为靠荣誉能统治七国吗?
Do you think honor keeps them in line?

你以为靠荣誉能保持和平吗?
Do you think it's honor that's keeping the peace?

是恐惧-- 恐惧和鲜血.
It's fear-- fear and blood.

那我们和疯王还有什么区别.
Then we're no better than the Mad King.

小心, 奈德. 你小心点.
Careful, Ned. Careful now.

你要刺杀一个女孩子
You want to assassinate a girl

仅仅因为八爪蜘蛛听到一个谣言?
because the Spider heard a rumor?

不是谣言, 大人. 前朝公主确实怀孕了.
No rumor, My Lord. The princess is with child.

消息的来源呢?
Based on whose information?

乔拉莫尔蒙爵士.
Ser Jorah Mormont.

他现在为坦格利安家族效力.
He is serving as advisor to the Targaryens.

莫尔蒙? 你这消息来源于
Mormont? You bring us the whispers

千里之外的一个叛徒, 能可靠吗?
of a traitor half a world away and call it fact?

乔拉莫尔蒙是个奴隶贩子, 但不是叛徒.
Jorah Mormont's a slaver, not a traitor.

我知道对重视荣誉的人来说区别不大.
Small difference, I know, to an honorable man.

他违犯了律法, 背叛了家族, 逃离了祖国.
He broke the law, betrayed his family, fled our land.

我们要听信这种人的消息去行刺?
We commit murder on the word of this man?
如果他是对的呢? Robert: And if he's right?

如果她生下一个儿子呢?
If she has a son?

一个坦格利安率领一支多斯拉克大军...
A Targaryen at the head of a Dothraki army...
- 那怎么办? - 狭海依旧隔在中间. - What then? - The Narrow Sea still lies between us.

我才不担心多斯拉克人
I'll fear the Dothraki

除非他们能教会他们的马在水上走路.
the day they teach their horses to run on water.

什么也别做?
Do nothing?

这就是你睿智的建议?
That's your wise advice?

等我们的敌人登陆了再说?
Do nothing till our enemies are on our shores?

你们都是我的重臣!
You're my council. Counsel!

来跟这满脑子荣誉的傻瓜讲讲道理.
Speak sense to this honorable fool.

我了解您的顾虑, 大人.
I understand your misgivings, My Lord.

我实话实说. 我们讨论的是件可怕的事
Truly, I do. It is a terrible thing

是件卑鄙的事.
we must consider, a vile thing.

然而我们这些冒昧为政的人有时必须
Yet we who presume to rule must sometimes

为了国家的福祉做一些卑鄙的事.
do vile things for the good of the realm.

倘若诸神真给了丹妮莉丝一个儿子,
Should the gods grant Daenerys a son,

整个国家将血流成河.
the realm will bleed.

我对这个女孩毫无恶感,
I bear this girl no ill will,
但是倘若多斯拉克人真的入侵, but should the Dothraki invade,

会有多少无辜百姓死于非命?
how many innocents will die?

会有多少繁华城镇付之一炬?
How many towns will burn?

那么比较明智甚或比较仁慈的做法,
Is it not wiser, kinder even,

会不会是让她现在死去
that she should die now

以使万千生灵能平安地活下去呢?
so that tens of thousands might live?

我们多年以前就该杀掉他们俩了.
We should have had them both killed years ago.

当你发现跟自己上床的原来是个丑女,
When you find yourself in bed with an ugly woman,
最好的做法就是闭上眼睛赶紧办事. best close your eyes, get it over with.

杀了她. 越快越好.
Cut her throat. Be done with it.

我跟随你冲锋陷阵--
I followed you into war--

进行过两场战争,
twice,

从不怀疑,
without doubts,

从无顾虑.
without second thoughts.

但这次我不能跟随你.
But I will not follow you now.

和我一起长大的劳勃
The Robert I grew up with

绝不会在一个尚未出生的孩子的阴影下颤抖.
didn't tremble at the shadow of an unborn child.

那么刺杀她的计划.
She dies.

我绝对不会参与.
I will have no part in it.

你是国王之手, 史塔克大人.
You're the King's Hand, Lord Stark.

你必须听我命令, 否则我就另请高明.
You'll do as I command or I'll find me a hand who will.

那我祝他胜任愉快.
And good luck to him.

我本以为你会比疯王强.
I thought you were a better man.

滚. 滚, 去你的吧.
Out. Out, damn you.
cleaned_subtitle: Get out. Get out, take your leave.

subtitle:
我受够你了.
I'm done with you.

快滚回临冬城去!
Go, run back to Winterfell!

否则我会把你的头砍下来插在抢尖上!
I'll have your head on a spike!
我自己来, 你这傻瓜! Robert: I'll put it there myself, you fool!
你认为你太善良了? 太骄傲太荣誉了? You think you're too good for this? Too proud and honorable?
这是一场战争! This is a war!

我要带我女儿们一起走.
I'll go ahead with my daughters.

让她们准备好. 你去安排.
Get them ready. Do it yourself.

- 别向任何人透露. - 好的, 大人.
- Don't ask anyone for help. - Right away, My Lord.

贝里席大人想见您.
Lord Baelish is here for you.

陛下他后来还接着骂了一通
His Grace went on about you at some length

在你离开之后.
after you took your leave.

其中还出现了 "背叛" 这样的字眼.
The word "treason" was mentioned.

你有什么事?
What can I do for you?

您打算何时回临冬城?
When do you return to Winterfell?

怎么? 这与你何干?
Why? What do you care?

如果您明天傍晚还在这儿,
If you're still here come nightfall,

我想带您去见见琼恩艾林...
I'll take you to see the last person Jon Arryn

病倒前找过的最后一个人.
spoke with before falling ill.

如果您对此仍有兴趣得话.
If that sort of thing still interests you.

我没时间.
I don't have the time.

花不了一个小时的. 你决定吧.
It won't take more than an hour. But as you please.

把我们的所有人都找齐
Round up all the men we have

布置在女孩房间外面.
and station them outside the girls' chambers.

- 你手下最好的两个剑士是谁? - 海华和韦尔.
- Who are your best two swords? - Heward and Wyl.

让他们到马房找我.
Find them and meet me at the stables.

你未经许可把他带到这里来?
You bring him here without permission?
让他弄脏我的家? You pollute my home with his presence?
( Suckling )

你的姨妈做了一件坏事, 罗宾,
Your aunt has done a bad thing, Robin,

一件非常坏的事.
a very bad thing.

你还记得她, 是吧?
You remember her, don't you?
他漂亮吧? Isn't he beautiful?

也很强壮. 琼恩很清楚.
And strong too. Jon knew it.

他的临终遗言就是 "种姓强韧."
His last words were "the seed is strong."

他要大家都知道
He wanted everyone to know
他儿子长大后会是个强壮的男子汉. what a good, strong boy his son would grow up to be.

看看他, 全艾林谷的领主.
Look at him, the Lord of all the Vale.

莱莎,
Lysa,

是你写信告诉我关于兰尼斯特家的事,
you wrote me about the Lannisters,

- 警告我-- - 我是叫你离他们远点!
- warning me-- - To stay away from them!

而不是带他们来这里!
Not to bring one here!

妈咪?
Mommy?
- 他就是那个坏人吗? - 是的. - Is that the bad man? - It is.
( Creepy laugh )

他好小呀.
He's little.
他是兰尼斯特家的小恶魔提利昂. Lysa: He's Tyrion the imp of house Lannister.

害死你父亲的就是他.
He killed your father.

就是他谋杀了国王之手!
He murdered the Hand of the King!

哦, 他也是我杀的?
Oh, did I kill him too?
我还真是个忙碌的家伙. I've been a very busy man.

你最好管紧你的舌头!
You will watch your tongue!

这些都是艾林谷的骑士.
These men are knights of the Vale.

个个都对琼恩艾林敬爱有加.
Every one of them loved Jon Arryn.

个个都愿意为我牺牲性命.
Every one of them would die for me.

要是我有什么不测,
If any harm comes to me,

我老哥詹姆很乐意料理他们.
my brother Jaime will see that they do.

你不能伤害我们.
You can't hurt us.

没人能在这里伤害我们. 告诉他, 妈咪!
No one can hurt us here. Tell him, mommy!

- 告诉他! - 嘘, 我亲爱的孩子.
- Tell him! - Shh shh shh, my sweet boy.

他只是想吓唬我们.
He's just trying to frighten us.

兰尼斯特家的人全都是骗子.
Lannisters are all liars.
谁也别想伤害我的宝贝. No one will hurt my baby.
妈咪... Mommy...

我想看那个坏人飞.
I want to see the bad man fly.

也许会的, 我的小宝贝.
Perhaps you will, my little love.
这个人是我的俘虏. This man is my prisoner.
我不能任他受到伤害. I will not have him harmed.

瓦狄斯爵士,
Ser Vardis,
我姐姐的小客人累了. my sister's guest is weary.
带他下去休息. Take him down below so he can rest.

把他介绍给莫德.
Introduce him to Mord.

你去睡觉吧, 侏儒.
You go sleep, dwarf man.

好好睡觉, 小侏儒!
( Laughing ) Sleep good, little dwarf man!
( Slams, lock clanks )
( Wind gusting )

史塔克能保住脑袋算是万幸.
Lord Stark's lucky he still has a head.

劳勃会发上几天的火, 但他不会做什么.
Robert will rant for a few days, but he won't do anything.

他喜欢这个人.
He adores the man.

你嫉妒了.
( Surprised ) You're jealous.

你确信这不会受伤吗?
Are you sure this won't hurt?
除非我手滑. - Only if I slip. - ( Scraping )

- 你喜欢我这个样子? - 嗯.
- And you'd prefer me like this? - Mm-hmm.

如果你想要没毛的, 也许应该找个小男孩.
If you want hairless, maybe you should find a little boy.

我想要的是你.
I want you.

我兄弟觉得任何没上过战场的人都不算男人.
My brother thinks that anyone who hasn't been to war isn't a man.

他对待我好象我是个被宠坏的孩子.
He treats me as if I'm a spoiled child.

哦, 你不是吗?
Oh, and you're not?

洛拉斯提利尔, 百花骑士?
Loras Tyrell, the knight of the flowers?

你参加过几场战争?
How many wars have you fought in?

哦, 你父亲为你这套盔甲花了多少钱?
Oh, and how much did your father spend on that armor of yours?

别动.
Hold still.

劳勃和史坦尼斯总是说我不够强悍,
All I ever hear from Robert and Stannis is how I'm not tough enough,

说我害怕看见血--
how I squirm at the sight of blood--

但看到那人在肉搏战被打下眼球确实很恶心.
you did vomit when that boy's eye was knocked out in the melee.

他的眼球还在眼眶外乱晃!
His eye was dangling out of the damn socket!
cleaned_subtitle: His eye was rolling around wildly outside its orbit!

subtitle:
他学艺不精就不该上场肉搏.
He shouldn't have entered the melee if he didn't know how to fight.

你说得轻松.
Easy for you to say.

不是所有人都拥有剑术天赋.
Not everyone is such a gifted swordsman.

这不是天赋. 不是什么人给我的.
( Groans ) It's not a gift. No one gave it to me.

我剑术好是因为我勤于练习--
I'm good because I work at it--

自我能拿棒子的时候起每天都练习.
every day of my life since I could hold a stick.

我也可以整天练习, 每天练习,
I could work at fighting all day, every day,

但还是不可能比得上你.
and still never be as good as you.

好吧, 我想这一不定.
Yes well, I guess we'll never know.
( Sighs )

- 所有地方? - 所有地方.
- Everywhere? - Everywhere.

最后会怎样?
So how did it end up?

那个坦格利安女孩会死吗?
The Targaryen girl will die?

必须这样做, 虽然不令人愉快.
It needs to be done, unpleasant as it is.

劳勃很关心这个.
Robert's rather tasteless about it.

每次他说要杀死她,
Every time he talks about killing her,

桌子都被敲得跳起来.
I swear the table rises six inches.

可惜他对他妻子没这么大热情.
It's a shame he can't muster the same enthusiasm for his wife.

他确实对她家的钱有深深的欲望.
He does have a deep, abiding  lust for her money.

你无法小看兰尼斯特家--
You have to give it to the Lannisters--

他们也许是最傲慢最无聊的混蛋
they may be the most pompous, ponderous cunts
cleaned_subtitle: They may be the most arrogant and boring jerks

subtitle:
令诸神都难以忍受,
the gods ever suffered to walk the world,

但他们的钱多得不象话.
but they do have outrageous amounts of money.

我的钱倒也不少.
I have an outrageous amount of money.

没有兰尼斯特家那样多.
Not as much as the Lannisters.

但还是比你多得多.
( Laughing ) But a lot more than you.

劳勃要带我一起去打猎.
Robert's threatening to take me hunting with him.

上次我们去了两星期.
Last time we were out there for two weeks.

下雨时还在树林里打滚, 连续好几天,
Tramping through the trees in the rain, day after day,

为了能把矛刺进什么东西的肚子里.
all so he can stick his spear into something's flesh.

哦. 劳勃喜欢杀戮.
Oh. But Robert loves his killing.

- 他是国王. - 嗯.
- And he's the King. - Hmm.

- 为什么他能称王? - 因为他喜欢杀戮.
- How did that ever happen? - Because he loves his killing.

他也曾经擅长杀戮.
And he used to be good at it.

你知道谁应该称王吗?
Do you know who should be king?

- 别开玩笑. - 我是认真的.
- Be serious. - I am.

我父亲会做你的后盾.
My father could be your bank.

我从未上过战场, 但我会为你而战.
I've never fought in a war before, but I'd fight for you.

我在继承顺位中排第四.
I'm fourth in line.

劳勃在疯王的继承顺位中排第几呢?
And where was Robert in the line of royal succession?

乔佛里是个混蛋.
Joffrey is a monster.

- 托曼才八岁. - 史坦尼斯呢?
- Tommen is eight. - Stannis?

史坦尼斯象只龙虾那样强硬古板.
Stannis has the personality of a lobster.

但他仍是我的哥哥.
He's still my older brother.

- 你干什么?! - 看一看.
- ( Gasps ) What are you doing?! - Look at it.

你割伤我了.
You cut me.

不过是血. 我们体内都有血.
It's just blood. We've all got it in us.

有时会流出一点.
Sometimes a little spills.

<font color=#00FF00>? Game of Thrones 1x07 ?</font>
<font color=#00FFFF>You Win or You Die</font>
Malay Dev
[Fanfare]
[Crow caws]
[Man yells]

[Horse neighs]
[Man shouting]

''Summoned to court
to answer for the crimes

''of your bannerman Gregor Clegane,
the Mountain.'' Er...

''Arrive within the fortnight
or be branded an enemy of the crown.''
Poor Ned Stark.
Brave man, terrible judgment.
Attacking him was stupid.
[Grunts]
Lannisters...
don't act like fools.
Are you going to say something clever?
Go on, say something clever.
Catelyn Stark took my brother.

- Why is he still alive?
- Tyrion?
Ned Stark.
One of our men interfered,

speared him through the leg
before l could finish him.
Why is he still alive?
lt wouldn't have been clean.
Clean.

You spend too much time worrying
about what other people think of you.

l could care less
what anyone thinks of me.

That's what you want
people to think of you.
lt's the truth.

When you hear them whispering
''kingslayer'' behind your back,
doesn't it bother you?
Of course it bothers me.
A lion doesn't concern himself
with the opinions of the sheep.

l suppose l should be grateful
that your vanity

got in the way
of your recklessness.
l'm giving you half of our forces -
30,OOO men.

You will bring them to Catelyn Stark's
girlhood home
and remind her that Lannisters
pay their debts.

l didn't realise you placed such
a high value on my brother's life.
He's a Lannister.

He might be the lowest of the Lannisters,
but he's one of us.
And every day that he remains a prisoner,
the less our name commands respect.

So the lion does concern himself
with the opinions of...
No, that's not an opinion. It's a fact.

lf another house
can seize one of our own
and hold him captive with impunity,
we are no longer a house to be feared.
Your mother's dead.
Before long l'll be dead.
And you...

and your brother
and your sister
and all of her children.

All of us dead,
all of us rotting in the ground.
lt's the family name that lives on.
lt's all that lives on.

Not your personal glory,
not your honour,
but family.
Do you understand?
Hmm.

You're blessed with abilities
that few men possess.

You're blessed to belong to the most
powerful family in the Kingdoms.
And you're still blessed with youth.

And what have you done
with these blessings, huh?

You've served as a glorified
bodyguard for two kings -

one a madman,
the other a drunk.

The future of our family will be determined
in these next few months.

We could establish a dynasty
that will last a thousand years.

Or we could collapse into nothing,
as the Targaryens did.

l need you to become the man
you were always meant to be.
Not next year. Not tomorrow.
Now.
[Bell tolling]
You're in pain.
l've had worse, my lady.
Perhaps it's time to go home.

The South doesn't seem
to agree with you.
l know the truth Jon Arryn died for.
Do you, Lord Stark?

ls that why you called me here,
to pose me riddles?
Has he done this before?

Jaime would have killed him.
My brother is worth a thousand of your friend.
Your brother...
or your lover?

The Targaryens wed brothers
and sisters for 300 years
to keep bloodlines pure.

Jaime and l are more
than brother and sister.
We shared a womb.

We came into this world together.
We belong together.
My son saw you with him.
Do you love your children?

- With all my heart.
- No more than l love mine.

- And they're all Jaime's.
- [Chuckles] Thank the gods.

ln the rare event that Robert leaves his whores
for long enough to stumble drunk into my bed,
l finish him off in other ways.

- In the morning, he doesn't remember.
- You've always hated him.
Hated him? l worshipped him.

Every girl in the Seven Kingdoms dreamed
of him, but he was mine by oath.

And when l finally saw him
on our wedding day in the Sept of Baelor,
lean and fierce and black-bearded,
it was the happiest moment of my life.

That night he crawled on top of me,
stinking of wine,

and did what he did,
what little he could do,
and whispered in my ear, ''Lyanna.''

Your sister was a corpse
and l was a living girl
and he loved her more than me.

When the king returns from his hunt,
l'll tell him the truth.

You must be gone by then -
you and your children.

l will not have
their blood on my hands.
Go as far away as you can,
with as many men as you can.
Because wherever you go,
Robert's wrath will follow you.
And what of my wrath, Lord Stark?
You should have taken the realm for yourself.

Jaime told me about the day
King's Landing fell.

He was sitting in the Iron Throne
and you made him give it up.

All you needed to do
was climb the steps yourself.
Such a sad mistake.
l've made many mistakes in my life...
but that wasn't one of them.
Oh, but it was.

When you play the game of thrones,
you win.. .
or you die.
There is no middle ground.

- [Children laughing]
- Come here.
[Children crying]
[Dog barking]
[Woman moaning]
Oh, yes! Oh, yes!
[Woman laughs and moans]
Oh!
Oh, yes! Oh! Oh!
Oh, yes, yes, yes. Oh!
Oh, yes! Oh, yes!
Oh!
No, no, no, no!

ls that what they teach you
up in the North?

And you -
wherever you're from -

do you have any idea
how ridiculous you sound?

Either of you understand
a thing that l'm saying?
Yes, my lord.
Let's start over, shall we?
You be the man...
and you be the woman.
Well, go ahead.
Slowly.
[Soft moaning]

You're not fooling them.
They just paid you.
They know what you are.
They know it's all just an act.

Your job is to make them
forget what they know.
Now, that takes time.
You need to...
ease into it.
Go ahead.
Ease into it.

He's winning you over

subtitle:
然后打下红堡救出奈德.
and then it's on to the Red Keep to free Ned.

- 你这老鬼头, 罗德利克. - 大琼恩.
- You old devil, Rodrik. - Jon.

你的功夫还没荒废, 是吗?
You're not wasting away, are you?

我还清楚地记得你出生那天的样子...
I remember the day you came into this world

脸红红的, 大声哭闹.
red-faced and squalling.

现在我却看到你率领着一支大军上战场.
And now I find you leading a host to war.

- 没别人了. - 没别人?
- There was no one else. - No one?

我刚才见到的那些人是谁?
Who were those men I saw here?

- 他们都不是史塔克. - 他们都身经百战.
- None of them are Starks. - All of them are seasoned in battle.

如果你想把我送回临冬城...
If you think you can send me back to Winterfell--

哦, 我真希望能这么做.
Oh, would that I could.

我收到了...
There was...

一封信.
a letter.

珊莎写来的.
From Sansa.

你的意思是王后写来的.
From the Queen, you mean.

- 上面没有提到艾莉亚. - 确实没有.
- There's no mention of Arya. - No.

你带来多少人?
How many men do you have?

如果我去君临向乔佛里屈膝下跪...
If I go to King's Landing and bend my knee to Joffrey--

不, 那样你将永远无法离开.
you would never be allowed to leave. No.

我们最大的希望... 或者说惟一的希望...
Our best hope-- our only hope--

便是你能在战场上击败对手.
is that you can defeat them in the field.

如果我战败?
And if I lose?

你知道坦格利安家孩子们的下场吗...
Do you know what happened to the Targaryen children

- 当君临城陷的时候? - 他们在睡梦中被屠杀.
- when the Mad King fell? - They were butchered in their sleep.

是泰温兰尼斯特下的命令.
On the orders of Tywin Lannister.

多年的时光并没有使他变仁慈一点.
And the years have not made him kinder.

如果你战败,
If you lose,

你的父亲会死,
your father dies,

你的妹妹们也会死,
your sisters die,
我们都会死. we die.

好吧, 那事情就简单了.
Well, that makes it simple then.

我想是这样.
I suppose it does.

现在最好由波隆和我两个过去.
From here it might be best if Bronn and I continue alone.

对泰温之子提利昂来说最好.
Best for Tyrion son of Tywin.

对我们来说可不好.
Not best for me.

如果半人背叛我们,
If the half man betrays us,

多夫之子夏嘎就会剁掉他的命根子...
Shagga Son of Dolf will cut off his manhood--

拿去喂山羊, 我知道.
and feed it to the goats, yes.

那好吧.
All right then.

我要去见我父亲了.
Time to meet my father.

- 提利昂. - 叔叔.
- Tyrion. - Uncle.

父亲.
Father.

看来关于你已死的传言不攻自破了.
The rumors of your demise were unfounded.

真抱歉让您失望了.
Sorry to disappoint you.

这些是什么人...
And who are these...
你的同伴? Companions of yours?

这位是多夫之子夏嘎,
This is Shagga Son of Dolf,
石鸦部的酋长. Chieftain of the Stone Crows.
提魅之子提魅, 灼人部的首领. Timett Son of Timett, ruler of the Burned Men.
这位美少女是齐克之女齐拉 This fair maid is Chella daughter of Cheyk,
黑耳部的领袖. leader of the Black Ears.

而这位是波隆, 谁人之子来着...
And here we have Bronn son of...

你不会认识他的.
You wouldn't know him.

可否允许我为各位介绍我的父亲大人,
May I present My Lord Father,

兰尼斯特家族的泰陀斯之子泰温,
Tywin son of Tytos of House Lannister,
凯岩城主暨西境守护. Lord of Casterly Rock and Warden of the West?

非常感谢您为我出兵打仗.
Kind of you to go to war for me.

你使我们别无选择.
You left us no choice.

这事关家族的荣誉.
The honor of the House was at stake.

你哥哥詹姆绝不会如此轻易地束手就擒的.
Your brother would never have submitted to capture so meekly.

我们确实有所不同, 詹姆和我.
We have our differences, Jaime and I.

他更勇敢. 而我更帅气.
He's braver. I'm better looking.

他满身都是荣耀.
He's been covering himself in glory.

詹姆在金牙城外击溃了三河诸侯,
Jaime smashed the River Lords at the Golden Tooth,

现在正在围攻奔流城, 凯特琳史塔克的老家.
and now lays siege to Riverrun, Catelyn Stark's homeland.

史塔克家在做什么? 艾德大人?
And the Starks? Lord Eddard?

--现在是我们的人质. 他在地牢里无法带兵打仗.
--Is our hostage. He will lead no armies from his dungeon cell.

我那美丽的姐姐是怎么说服国王
How did my sweet sister persuade the King

囚禁他亲爱的朋友奈德的?
to imprison his dear friend Ned?

劳勃拜拉席恩死了. 如今是乔佛里在君临执政.
Robert Baratheon is dead. Joffrey rules in King's Landing.

你的意思是说是我姐姐在执政.
My sister rules, you mean.

史塔克的儿子已经下令召集封臣.
Stark's son has called his banners.

- 他正带着一支大军南下. - 不过是个毛头小子.
- He moves south with a strong host. - A green boy.

等他尝到战斗的滋味就会...
One taste of battle and he'll run

夹着尾巴逃回临冬城.
back to Winterfell wi his tail between his legs.

也许吧.
Maybe.

不过那小子确实很好战.
Though the boy does have a certain belligerence.

你会喜欢他的.
You'd like him.

既然我们说到打仗的事情,
While we're on the subject of war,

我对这几位朋友做过承诺
I made promises to my friends here

而兰尼斯特有债必还.
and a Lannister always pays his debts.
我们需要三千个头盔和盾牌, We shall require 3,000 helms and shields,

还有刀剑, 长枪,
plus swords, pikes,

护甲, 钉锤...
gorgets, maces--

如果大人同意,
if it please My Lord,

亚当爵士要我来报告, 北境军队
Ser Addam bids me report that the Northmen

已经越过了颈泽.
have crossed the neck.

小狼就要钻进狮口了.
The wolf rushes into the lion's jaws.

好吧. 凯冯, 立刻下令敲鼓集合.
So be it. Kevan, command the drummers beat assembly.

并送信给詹姆说我将前去同罗柏史塔克决战.
And send word to Jaime that I am moving against Robb Stark.

遵命, 大人.
At once, My Lord.

听说山地部落的人都是伟大的战士.
It is said that the men of the Mountain clans are great warriors.

与我一同出兵作战
Ride with me against my enemies

你们将得到我儿子承诺的一切, 甚至更多.
and you shall have all my son promised you and more.

但这个半人得跟我们一起作战.
Only if the half man fights with us.

直到我们拿到他答应的武器,
Until we hold the steel he pledged us,

这小狮子的命是我们的.
the little lion's life is ours.
斥候报告说泰温大人正在北上. Rodrik: The scouts report Lord Tywin moves north.

我们需要凭借险要地形截住他,
We need to get him on broken ground,

使他的骑士无法发挥力量.
put his Knights at a disadvantage.

不, 我们要从他侧面绕过去
No, we need to get around him

并打破詹姆兰尼斯特对奔流城的围攻.
and break Jaime Lannister's siege of Riverrun.

这样三河诸候就会加入我们的队伍.
Do that and the River Lords will join us.

无论怎样做我们都需要先过绿叉河
To do either we need to cross the river

而孪河城是过河的惟一路线.
and the only crossing is at The Twins.
佛雷大人控制着孪河桥. Theon: Lord Frey controls that bridge.

他是你父亲的封臣.
Your father's bannerman.

我父亲称他为 "迟到的佛雷大人"
"The late Lord Frey" my father calls him.

当年三叉戟河之战, 他在战斗结束后才现身.
At the Trident, he didn't appear until the battle was done.

不是每个人都把自己的誓言当回事的.
Some men takes their oaths more seriously than others.
( Grunting )

罗柏说得对. 我们需要那座桥.
Robb's right. We need that bridge.

那么该怎么办?
So what's it going to be?

我们先对付詹姆还是泰温?
Do we move against Jaime or Lord Tywin?

打扰了, 大人.
Your pardon, my lords.
我们抓住了一个兰尼斯特军的斥候. We've captured a Lannister scout.

别担心, 小伙子. 他不会活着离开这个帐篷.
Don't worry, lad. He won't b  leaving this tent with his head.

你们在哪儿发现他的?
Where did you find him?

在营地周围的树丛里.
In the brush above the encampment.
他好象正在估算人数. He looked to be counting.

你算出来有多少人?
How high did you get?

两万. 或许更多.
20,000. Maybe more.

你不必自己动手行刑.
You don't have to do this yourself.

您父亲会理解的...
Your father would understand--

我父亲懂得仁慈, 如果不是非杀不可.
My father unrstands mercy, when there is room for it.

他也懂得荣誉...
And he understands honor...

和勇气.
and courage.

放他走吧.
Let him go.

罗柏.
Robb.

去告诉泰温大人, 凛冬将至.
( Softly ) Tell Lord Tywin Winter is coming for him.

两万北境大军正在南下, 看看他是不是真的能拉金屎.
20,000 Northerners marching south to find out if he really does shit gold.
cleaned_subtitle: 20,000 Northerners marching south to see if he can truly be trustworthy.

subtitle:
遵命, 大人.
Yes, My Lord.

多谢, 大人.
Thank you, My Lord.

你疯了吗, 孩子?! 放他走?
Are you touched, boy?! Letting him go?

你又称我孩子了.
You call me boy again.

下去吧.
Go on.
( Growls )

喂.
Oi.
国王陛下决定... Pycelle: It is also the wish of His Grace
尽忠职守的杰诺斯史林特, that his loyal servant Janos Slynt,
- 都城守卫队司令... - 艾伦爵士. - Commander of the City Watch... - Ser Aron.
立刻擢升为贵族... ...Be at once raised to the rank of Lord...
- 盖尔斯大人. - ...赐予古老的赫伦堡, - Lord Gyles. - ...And granted the ancient seat of Harrenhal,
其子嗣将世代继承此等荣耀 and that his sons and grandsons shall hold this honor
直到世界末日. after him until the end of time.
( Lords mutter )

为取代叛徒艾德史塔克,
In the place of the traitor Eddard Stark,
国王陛下决定由泰温兰尼斯特, it is the wish of his Grace that Tywin Lannister,
凯岩城主暨西境守护, Lord of Casterly Rock and Warden of the West,
担任国王之手. be appointed Hand of the King.

最后,
Lastly,

于此密谋四起, 动乱不堪之际,
in these times of treason and turmoil,
御前会议认为... it is the view of the Council

乔佛里国王的生命安全
that the life and safety
of King Joffrey

实乃第一要务.
be of paramount importance.

巴利斯坦赛尔弥爵士.
Ser Barristan Selmy.

陛下, 我听候您的差遣.
Your Grace, I am yours to command.

请起, 巴利斯坦爵士.
Rise, Ser Barristan.

你可以卸下头盔了.
You may remove your helm.
长久以来你为国效命，尽忠职守. You have served the Realm long and faithfully.
七国上下每个人都对你心怀感激. Every man and woman in the Seven Kingdoms owes you thanks.

然而是时候让你卸下你的铠甲和宝剑了.
But it is time to put aside your armor and your sword.
你该安享晚年, 并自豪地回顾... It is time to rest and look back with pride

你长久以来的功绩了.
on your many years of service.
( Murmuring )

陛下, 御林铁卫乃是宣誓效命的兄弟.
Your Grace, the Kingsguard is a sworn brotherhood.
我们必须终身守誓. Our vows are taken for life.

惟有一死才能解除我们的神圣使命.
Only death relieves us of our sacred trust.

是谁的死, 巴利斯坦爵士? 是你还是你的国王?
Whose death, Ser Barristan? Yours or your King's?
我父亲的死就是你的责任. Joffrey: You let my father die.

你太老了, 谁都保护不了.
You're too old to protect anybody.

- 陛下-- - 御前会议已经决定
- Your Grace-- - The Council has determined

由詹姆兰尼斯特爵士接替你的职务
that Ser Jaime Lannister will take your place
担任御林铁卫队长. as Lord Commander of the Kingsguard.

那个人玷污了自己的宝剑
The man who profaned his blade

杀死了他宣誓要保护的国王!
with the blood of the King he had sworn to defend!

小心一点, 爵士.
Careful, Ser.

我们并非不知感恩
We have nothing but gratitude

您的长期贡献有目共睹, 爵士.
for your long service, good Ser.

您将得到一座坚固的海滨城堡,
You shall be given a stout Keep beside the sea,

以及满足您需要的大批仆役.
with servants to look after your every need.

给我一个养老的地方
A hall to die in
以及为我送终的人. and men to bury me.

我既生为一名骑士.
I am a Knight.

也要死得像个骑士.
I shall die a Knight.

像个没穿衣服的骑士, 是吧.
A naked Knight, apparently.
( Laughter )

即便现在我仍可以像切蛋糕一样把你们五个通通砍倒!
Even now I could cut through the five of you like carving a cake!

拿去, 小子!
Here, boy!

把它熔了加到铁王座上吧.
Melt it down and add it to the others.
( Doors creak, clang )

如果在场各位还有其他事...
If any man in this hall has other matters

请现在向国王陛下禀报
to set before His Grace, let him speak now

否则退朝.
or go forth and hold his silence.

陛下.
Your Grace.

请上前来, 小姐.
Come forward, My Lady.
史塔克家族的珊莎小姐. Steward: The Lady Sansa of House Stark.

珊莎, 你有事禀报国王陛下和御前会议?
Do you have some business for the King and the Council, Sansa?

是的.
I do.

启禀陛下, 我要为我父亲请求您的慈悲,
As it please Your Grace, I ask mercy for my father,

艾德史塔克大人, 前任国王之手.
Lord Eddard Stark, who was Hand of the King.

叛国大罪好似带毒的野草.
Treason is a noxious weed.

- 必须连根拔除... - 让她说下去.
- It should be torn out, root-- - Let her speak.

我要听听她的话.
I want to hear what she says.

感谢您, 陛下.
Thank you, Your Grace.

你要否认你父亲所犯罪行?
Do you deny your father's crime?

不, 诸位大人. 我明白他必须接受惩罚.
No, My Lords. I know he must be punished.

我请求的只是慈悲为怀.
All I ask is mercy.
我知道我父亲必定对其所为懊悔不已. I know My Lord father must regret what he did.

他是劳勃国王的好友, 他敬爱国王.
He was King Robert's friend and he loved him.

你们知道他是真心敬爱他.
You all know he loved him.

他从未想当国王之手, 直到国王要求他.
He never wanted to be Hand until the King asked him.

他必定是受人蛊惑... 蓝礼大人或史坦尼斯大人
They must have lied to him-- Lord Renly or Lord Stannis

或是其他什么人. 他们欺骗了他!
or somebody. They must have lied!

他说我不是国王.
He said I wasn't the King.

他为什么要那样说?
Why did he say that?

他受了重伤.
He was badly hurt.

派席尔大学士给他服用了罂粟花奶.
Maester Pycelle was giving him milk of the poppy.

当时他神智不清. 否则他绝不会那样说的.
He wasn't himself. Otherwise h  never would have said it.

孩子对父亲的信赖... 多么单纯天真.
A child's faith... Such sweet innocence.
可是人们不是常说, 智慧之言往往来自 And yet they say wisdom oft comes

孩童之口么.
from the mouths of babes.

但叛国就是叛国!
Treason is treason!

你还有什么事?
Anything else?

如果您心里仍然有我,
If you still have any affection in your heart for me,

请成全我这个心愿吧, 陛下.
please do me this kindness, Your Grace.

你的肺腑之言感动了我.
Your sweet words have moved me.

但你父亲必须先俯首认罪.
But your father has to confess.

他必须承认我是他的国王...
He has to confess and say that I'm the King...

不然我无法手下留情.
Or there'll be no mercy for him.

他一定会的.
He will.
( Music playing )

== 翻译: <font color="#00ff00">freesand</font> ==
== sync, corrected by <font color="#00ff00">elderman</font> ==
[Breathing]
[Varys] You've seen better days, my lord.
Another visit?
lt seems you're my last friend.
No, no, many still love you.

Sansa came to court this morning
to plead for your life.
On her knees begging for me. Hm!
Did you laugh with the others?

You do me wrong, my lord.
Your blood is the last thing l want.
l don't know what you want.
l've given up trying to guess.
When l was still a boy -
before they cut my balls off with a hot knife -

l travelled with a group of actors
through the free cities.

They taught me that
each man has a role to play.
The same is true at court.
l am the master of whisperers.

My role is to be sly, obsequious
and without scruples.
l'm a good actor, my lord.
Huh. Can you free me from this pit?
l could.
But will l?

- No.
- [Laughs]
As l said, l'm no hero.
What do you want? Tell me.

No riddles, no stories...
Tell me, what do you want?
Peace.

Did you know that your son is marching south
with an army of northmen? Loyal lad.
Fighting for his father's freedom.
Robb?
He's just a boy.
Boys have been conquerors before.

But the man giving Cersei sleepless nights
is the king's... the late king's brother.
Lord Stannis has the best claim to the throne.

He is a proven battle commander
and he is utterly without mercy.

Stannis Baratheon is Robert's true heir.
The throne is his by rights.
[Varys tuts]

Sansa pleaded so sweetly for your life.
It would be a shame to throw it away.
Cersei is no fool.

She knows a tame wolf
is more use to her than a dead one.

You want me to serve the woman who
murdered my king, who butchered my men,
who crippled my son?
l want you to serve the realm!

Tell the queen you will confess
your vile treason,
tell your son to lay down his sword
and proclaim Joffrey as the true heir.
Cersei knows you as a man of honour.

lf you give her the peace she needs,
and promise to carry her secret to your grave,

l believe she will allow you
to take the black

and live out your days on the Wall
with your brother and your bastard son.
cleaned_subtitle: : 'And spend your remaining years at the Wall, alongside your sibling and your illegitimate child.'

subtitle: [Chuckles]

You think my life
is some precious thing to me?

That l would trade my honour
for a few more years of...
Of what?
You grew up with actors.
You learned their craft and you learnt it well.
But l grew up with soldiers.
l learned how to die a long time ago.
Pity.
Such a pity.
What of your daughter's life, my lord?
ls that a precious thing to you?
[Water dripping]
[Cawing]
[Arrow whooshes]

lt's a birthday message
to his grand-niece Walda.

- Or so Walder Frey would have you think.
- [Catelyn] Keep shooting them down.

We can't risk Lord Walder sending
word of your movements to the Lannisters.

He's Grandfather's bannerman.
We can't expect his support?

[Greatjon] Expect nothing of Walder Frey
and you'll never be surprised.
Look.
[Robb] Father rots in a dungeon.
How long before they take his head?

We need to cross the Trident
and we need to do it now.

Just march up to his gates
and tell him you're crossing.

We've got five times his numbers.
You can take the Twins if you have to.

[Greatjon] Not in time.
Tywin Lannister marches north as we speak.

The Freys have
held the crossing for 600 years,

and for 600 years
they have never failed to exact their toll.
Have my horse saddled and ready.

Enter the Twins alone and he'll sell you
to the Lannisters as he likes.

Or throw you in a dungeon.
Or slit your throat.

My father would do whatever it took
to secure our crossing.
Whatever it took.

lf l'm going to lead this army, l can't have
other men doing my bargaining for me.
l agree.

- l'll go.
- [Theon] You can't!

l have known Lord Walder since l was a girl.
He would never harm me.
[Greatjon] Unless there was a profit in it.
What do you want?

lt is a great pleasure to see you again
after so many years, my lord.
Oh, spare me.

Your boy's too proud
to come before me himself.
What am l supposed to do with you?

Father, you forget yourself.
Lady Stark is here...

Who asked you? You're not Lord Frey yet,
not until l die. Do l look dead to you?

- Father, please...
- l need lessons in courtesy from you, bastard?
cleaned_subtitle:
- Father, could you possibly teach me good manners?
   - I'm sorry, I must learn politeness from you.

subtitle:
Your mother would still be a milkmaid
if l hadn't squirted you into her belly.
All right, you come forward.
[Smacking kiss]

There.
Now that l've observed the courtesies,

perhaps my sons will do me the honour
of shutting their mouths.

l vow to serve you, obey you,
to die for you if need be...
but let him go, Khaleesi.
l know what you intend. Do not.
l must.
[Sighs] You don't understand...

Don't ask me to stand aside
as you climb on that pyre.
l won't watch you burn.
ls that what you fear?
You will be my khalasar.
l see the faces of slaves.
l free you.

Take off your collars.
Go if you wish, no one will stop you.
But if you stay...
it will be as brothers and sisters,
as husbands and wives.
[Chuckles softly]
Ser Jorah, bind this woman to the pyre.
You swore to obey me.
[Grunting]
l am Daenerys Stormborn...
of House Targaryen...
of the blood of old Valyria.
l am the Dragon's Daughter.
And l swear to you...

that those who would harm you
will die screaming.

- You will not hear me scream.
- l will.
But it is not your screams l want.
Only your life.
[Singing]
[Wailing]
[Mirri screaming]
[Screaming continues]
[Chirruping]
[Soft snarls]
Blood of my blood.
[Hisses]
[Hisses]
[Shrieking]
[Shrieking continues]
